Video

Presentation, video, and technical specification for the video feature.

Many users struggle with dense text, so providing video alternatives is important. The video itself must be accessible (captions, audio description). This feature adds support for describing embedded video content by requiring a meaningful title attribute on the iframe.

Start here: Main results · HISTORY.md

Technical specification: Technical specification - Video (PDF).

Original page: /archive/accessibilitycluster.com_20240303/main-results/video/.

Contact: we4authors@funka.com
